oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Ward Gates carte-de-visite
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte-de-visite of John Ward Gates. He was a newspaper man from Jackson, Tennessee. Gates was a member of Henderson's Scouts in Nathan Bedford Forrest's Cavalry. He was captured near Holly Springs, Mississippi, in 1864 and sent to Alton, Illinois, then to Fort Delaware. Yates served as a newspaper editor after the war.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Fort Negley, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
